channel.title: Items > ally drops and other > other (> new category)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Items > ally drops and other > other (> new category)" - I suggest a new subcategory under Items > ally drops and other > other > special missions

item.title: Items > ally drops and other > other (> new category)
item.content:encoded:
I suggest that a new subcategory should be created under Items > ally drops and other > other (> special mission should be the new one).

This category should contain items which are now missing in the items list. Those are the items which are specific to a certain special mission.

I have thought of seven items so far.

Bunny Eggs
Disembodied head
Body chunk
Left arm chunk
Right arm chunk
Left leg chunk
Right leg chunk
